name: Paper Maker
description: A craftsman who produces paper from pulp; adventurers can purchase writing materials, commission special documents, or learn about the spread of information.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the earthy scent of wood pulp and the sound of paper being pressed and dried. The air carries the promise of communication and the essential nature of written knowledge, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of information creation and the importance of preserving thoughts and ideas.
